name: DuckDuckGo Dark Blue
description:
Simple re-coloring of DuckDuckGo.  This site already supports it's own dark themes using the site's UI, however I still get a flash of white (kinda blinding) when the page reloads.  This theme takes care of that.

NOTE: This style doesn't do anything about the default color for blank URL's or for about:blank, or about:newtab.

user.name: TheArkive
user.about:
I just theme stuff as I get to it, or as it annoys me...

The more it annoys me, the higher on the priority it gets to be themed!

I'll take requests, but I can't promise deadlines.

=======================

My style is always dark and easier on the eyes (been on a Dark Blue kick lately).  I prefer to have rows highlight on hover on almost every table.  I like buttons to do the same.

additional_info:
2017/05/02:
- fixed some icky bits
2016/03/08:
- fixed some dark text in rare cases; default text color is now #777 for all of duckduckgo.com in this style
2016/01/01:
- Send feedback btn
- code block after search
- adjusted highlight for elements according to the rest of my "dark blue" themes
2015/11/16:
- this is a total revamp took a few steps back to be able to make a cleaner and more comprehensive style for DuckDuckGo
- fixed "show more" button on tiles
